Software Assurance processes, activities and tasks This process view can be implemented using the following processes, activities, and tasks from this document. a) The Agreement processes (6.1) provide for the establishment of expectations and responsibilities related to software assurance, including legal agreements and licensing requirements, the protection of organizationsâ€™ assets that are accessible by suppliers, the possibility of compromise during delivery, detection of anomalies, detection of counterfeits in the application element at arrival, expectations for defect resolution, patch management,
